record.dc:title: 6BE8, 15BE8, Boone County, Kentucky. McCabe. View from hill.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Fort Ancient Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: View of Site Be 22, Be 23 & Be 8. Site No Be 8 in process of excavation. Be 23 on bank of creek and just to the left of drainage ditch in center of picture. Be 22 extends over all of bottom land in photo.
record.wpa:photograph_category: People Lab and Field Scenes; General Site and Excavation
